Marian for being so mean and took the wrap away.
Marian was sad. She had been so excited about the wrap and had wanted to share it with her family. But she had not thought about how her family would feel.

Tim felt very sad. He knew he had been mean to his sister. He tried to say sorry to Sue, but she was still mad at him. Tim's toe hurt for a long time, and he could not play outside. The moral of the story is, do not do bad things to others, or bad things may happen to you.

. He did not mean to be mean. He wanted to say sorry. He wanted to be friends again.
"Lily, please don't be mad at me. I am sorry. I was silly. Can you forgive me?" Tom said.
But Lily did not listen. She was too angry and hurt. She got up and ran away. She did not look back.
Tom was alone on the mountain. He felt sad and lonely. He wished he had been nicer to Lily. He wished he had not climbed the mountain. He wished he had a friend.
